entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 10:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 35 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
